name: Rocketeer's Challenge!
description:
Rocketeer's challenge is an obstacle course game where you fly through meteor fields,mines and alien space ships!

Currently,the game is in a demo state containing 6 different levels of varying difficulties a handy death counter to see how many times your rocket crashed!

I will add more levels and features as time goes. This game is still very much in it's infancy and every bit of feedback I'll take to heart in making sure the player's experience is top notch!

Average time in-game: 20-25 minutes.
